trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived form, provides functionality for a task that wraps a command line tool.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生表單中覆寫時，提供包裝命令列工具的工作功能。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class provides default implementations for the methods and properties of a task that wraps a command line tool.
trans-unit.target: 此抽象類別會提供預設實作的方法和屬性的包裝命令列工具的工作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask"></xref>指定<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>.</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>類別

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> for task resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>工作資源。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> and Help keyword prefix.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask"></xref>類別具有指定<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>和 Help 關鍵字前置詞。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> for task resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>工作資源。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword to use for messages raised by the task.
trans-unit.target: 要用於工作所引發訊息的說明關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: Calls the host object to perform the work of the task.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫主物件來執行工作的工作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method was successfule; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果該方法 successfule;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the process executing the task by asking it to close nicely, then after a short period, forcing termination.
trans-unit.target: 取消執行的工作要求關閉，然後短的時間，強制終止程序。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified temporary file.
trans-unit.target: 刪除指定的暫存檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the delete operation fails for any reason (such as if a file is locked by antivirus software), then this method logs a warning rather than throwing an exception, which would cause the build to fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果刪除作業失敗，因為任何原因 （例如，如果檔案由鎖定防毒軟體），則這個方法會記錄為警告而非擲回例外狀況，這會導致建置失敗。

trans-unit.source: The name of the temporary file to delete.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除之暫存檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that command line echoing is turned off.
trans-unit.target: 表示命令列回應為關閉狀態。

trans-unit.source: MSBuild turns off command line echoing by passing /Q on the cmd.exe command line.
trans-unit.target: 命令列回應藉由在 cmd.exe 命令列上傳遞 /Q 關閉 MSBuild。

trans-unit.source: True when command line echo is off.
trans-unit.target: 關閉 命令列回應時，則為 true。

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of environment variable name-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 取得一組環境變數的名稱 / 值組。

trans-unit.source: Designed to be overridden in a custom task class (derived from ToolTask) to return a set of new or altered environment variables to create the execution context of the associated tool.
trans-unit.target: 設計自訂工作類別 （衍生自 ToolTask） 中傳回一組新的或更改的環境變數，以建立相關聯工具的執行內容覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The ExecuteTool method passes these environment variables to the StartInfo of the process in which the tool executes.
trans-unit.target: ExecuteTool 方法會將這些環境變數傳遞至程序，此工具執行所在的 StartInfo。

trans-unit.source: Any environment variables not included in the EnvironmentOverride dictionary are inherited from the process in which the ExecuteTool method executes.
trans-unit.target: EnvironmentOverride 字典中未包含任何環境變數被繼承自 ExecuteTool 方法執行於其中的程序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 傳回一組環境變數。

trans-unit.source: Each dictionary key is the name of the environment variable to override and the dictionary value is the value to set for that environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 每個字典索引鍵是要覆寫的環境變數的名稱，而字典值是要設定該環境變數的值。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of EnvironmentOverride returns null.
trans-unit.target: EnvironmentOverride 的預設實作會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Array of equals-separated pairs of environment variables that should be passed to the spawned executable, in addition to (or selectively overriding) the regular environment block.
trans-unit.target: 等於分隔組環境變數，都應該傳遞至繁衍的可執行檔，除了 （或選擇性地覆寫） 的陣列在規則環境區塊。

trans-unit.source: Using this instead of EnvironmentOverride as that takes a StringDictionary, which cannot be set from an MSBuild project.
trans-unit.target: 使用此而不 EnvironmentOverride 的 StringDictionary 做，它無法從設定 MSBuild 專案。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Runs the exectuable file with the specified task parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的工作參數執行可執行檔。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the task runs successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果工作執行成功。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a temporoary response (.rsp) file and runs the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 建立暫存回應 (.rsp) 檔案，並執行可執行檔。

trans-unit.source: The path to the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 可執行檔路徑。

trans-unit.source: The command line arguments to place in the .rsp file.
trans-unit.target: 命令列引數放入.rsp 檔案中。

trans-unit.source: The command line arguments to pass directly to the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 命令列引數直接傳遞至可執行檔。

trans-unit.source: The returned exit code of the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 可執行檔傳回的結束代碼。

trans-unit.source: If the task logged errors, but the executable returned an exit code of 0, this method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作已記錄錯誤，但可執行檔傳回結束代碼 0，則這個方法會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets the returned exit code of the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 取得可執行檔傳回的結束代碼。

trans-unit.source: The returned exit code of the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 可執行檔傳回的結束代碼。

trans-unit.source: If the task logged errors, but the executable returned an exit code of 0, this method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作已記錄錯誤，但可執行檔傳回結束代碼 0，則這個方法會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string value containing the command line arguments to pass directly to the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串值，包含要直接傳遞給可執行檔的命令列引數。

trans-unit.source: This method is called after <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.SkipTaskExecution%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.SkipTaskExecution%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.SkipTaskExecution%2A></xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A>之後呼叫這個方法

trans-unit.source: A string value containing the command line arguments to pass directly to the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 字串值，包含要直接傳遞給可執行檔的命令列引數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the fully qualified path to the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可執行檔的完整的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ToolName%2A> property if the tool is located in the system path.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回值的<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ToolName%2A>屬性，若工具位於系統路徑。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ToolName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified path to the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 可執行檔的完整的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string value containing the command line arguments to add to the response (.rsp) file before running the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之前要加入回應檔 (.rsp) 執行可執行檔的命令列引數的字串值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called after <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.SkipTaskExecution%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.SkipTaskExecution%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.SkipTaskExecution%2A></xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A>之後呼叫這個方法

trans-unit.source: a string value containing the command line arguments to add to the response (.rsp) file before running the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 字串值，包含之前要加入回應檔 (.rsp) 執行可執行檔的命令列引數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the information required to spawn the process executing the tool.
trans-unit.target: 初始化繁衍的處理序正在執行的工具所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The path to the tool.
trans-unit.target: 工具的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The command line commands.
trans-unit.target: 命令列命令。

trans-unit.source: The response file switch.
trans-unit.target: 回應檔參數中。

trans-unit.source: The information required to start the process.
trans-unit.target: 啟動程序所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns the command line switch used by the executable file to specifiy a response (.rsp) file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回使用指定的可執行檔的回應檔 (.rsp) 的命令列參數。

trans-unit.source: This method is only called if <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.GenerateResponseFileCommands%2A> returns a non-empty string value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法才會呼叫<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.GenerateResponseFileCommands%2A>傳回非空白字串值。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.GenerateResponseFileCommands%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called after <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.SkipTaskExecution%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.GenerateResponseFileCommands%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A>、<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.SkipTaskExecution%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.GenerateResponseFileCommands%2A>。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.GenerateResponseFileCommands%2A></xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.SkipTaskExecution%2A></xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A>之後呼叫這個方法

trans-unit.source: The full path to the temporary .rsp file.
trans-unit.target: 暫存.rsp 檔案的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: The command line switch used by the executable file to specifiy a response (.rsp) file.
trans-unit.target: 命令列參數來指定可執行檔使用回應檔 (.rsp)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the directory in which to run the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在其中執行可執行檔的目錄。

trans-unit.source: This is a method rather than a property so that derived classes (like Exec) can choose to expose a public WorkingDirectory property, and it would be confusing to have two properties.
trans-unit.target: 這是一種方法，而不是屬性，而衍生的類別 （例如 Exec) 可以選擇公開公用 WorkingDirectory 屬性，它可能會造成混淆，有兩個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The directory in which to run the executable file, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if the executable file should be run in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 在其中執行可執行檔，則為 null 參考的目錄 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 如果應該在目前的目錄執行可執行檔。

trans-unit.source: Handles execution errors raised by the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 處理由可執行檔引發執行錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the executable file returns a non-zero exit code.
trans-unit.target: 可執行檔傳回非零結束代碼時，才會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this method is used as the return value of the task.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的傳回值作為工作的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method runs successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果方法執行成功。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Whether this ToolTask has logged any errors
trans-unit.target: 這個 ToolTask 是否已記錄任何錯誤

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the host object of the task.
trans-unit.target: 初始化工作的主物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.HostObjectInitializationStatus"></xref> of the host object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.HostObjectInitializationStatus"> </xref>主機物件。

trans-unit.source: Parses a single line of text to identify any errors or warnings in canonical format.
trans-unit.target: 剖析單行文字，以識別任何錯誤或警告標準格式。

trans-unit.source: A single line of text for the method to parse.
trans-unit.target: 單一方法來剖析的文字行。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"></xref> that indicates the importance level with which to log the message.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"> </xref> ，表示用來記錄訊息的重要性層級。

trans-unit.source: Logs the tool name and path to all registered loggers.
trans-unit.target: 記錄所有已註冊記錄器的工具名稱和路徑。

trans-unit.source: The executable file name.
trans-unit.target: 可執行檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: The path to the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 可執行檔路徑。

trans-unit.source: Should ALL messages received on the standard error stream be logged as errors.
trans-unit.target: 應該為錯誤記錄在標準錯誤資料流上收到的所有訊息。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Logs the starting point of the run to all registered loggers.
trans-unit.target: 記錄所有已註冊的記錄器執行的起點。

trans-unit.source: A descriptive message to provide loggers, usually the command line and switches.
trans-unit.target: 提供記錄器，通常是命令列和交換器的描述性訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> of the response file.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Text.Encoding>回應檔。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: The encoding is <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> by default.
trans-unit.target: 編碼是<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>預設。</xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> of the response file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Encoding>回應檔。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: Overridable method to escape the content of the response file.
trans-unit.target: 可覆寫方法以逸出回應檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: The response string.
trans-unit.target: 回應字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the response string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回回應字串。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether task execution should be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否應該略過工作執行。

trans-unit.source: This method is called after <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask.ValidateParameters%2A>之後呼叫這個方法

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to skip task execution; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>略過工作執行;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> of the standard error stream of the task.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Text.Encoding>工作標準錯誤資料流。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: Console-based output uses the current system OEM code page by default.
trans-unit.target: 主控台輸出預設會使用目前的系統 OEM 字碼頁。

trans-unit.source: Note that we should not use Console.OutputEncoding here since processes we run don't really have much to do with our console window (and also Console.OutputEncoding doesn't return the OEM code page if the running application that hosts MSBuild is not a console application).
trans-unit.target: 請注意，我們不應該使用 Console.OutputEncoding 這裡因為我們執行處理程序實際上沒有太與我們的主控台視窗 （而且也 Console.OutputEncoding 不會傳回的 OEM 字碼頁如果執行的應用程式裝載 MSBuild 不是主控台應用程式）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> of the response file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Encoding>回應檔。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: Task Parameter: Importance with which to log text from the standard error stream.
trans-unit.target: 工作參數︰ 用來從標準錯誤資料流記錄文字的重要性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the actual importance at which standard error messages will be logged.
trans-unit.target: 取得標準錯誤訊息將記錄的實際重要性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the actual importance at which standard error messages will be logged.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的標準錯誤訊息將記錄的實際重要性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"></xref> with which to log errors.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"></xref>用來記錄錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"></xref> with which to log errors.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"> </xref>用來記錄錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> of the standard output stream of the task.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Text.Encoding>工作標準輸出資料流。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: Console-based output uses the current system OEM code page by default.
trans-unit.target: 主控台輸出預設會使用目前的系統 OEM 字碼頁。

trans-unit.source: Note that we should not use Console.OutputEncoding here since processes we run don't really have much to do with our console window (and also Console.OutputEncoding doesn't return the OEM code page if the running application that hosts MSBuild is not a console application).
trans-unit.target: 請注意，我們不應該使用 Console.OutputEncoding 這裡因為我們執行處理程序實際上沒有太與我們的主控台視窗 （而且也 Console.OutputEncoding 不會傳回的 OEM 字碼頁如果執行的應用程式裝載 MSBuild 不是主控台應用程式）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> of the response file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Encoding>回應檔。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: Task Parameter: Importance with which to log text from the standard out stream.
trans-unit.target: 工作參數︰ 用來從標準輸出資料流記錄文字的重要性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the actual importance at which standard out messages will be logged.
trans-unit.target: 取得標準輸出訊息將會記錄的實際重要性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the actual importance at which standard out messages will be logged.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的標準輸出訊息將會記錄的實際重要性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"></xref> with which to log errors.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"></xref>用來記錄錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"></xref> with which to log errors.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"> </xref>用來記錄錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A timeout to wait for a task to terminate before killing it.
trans-unit.target: 若要等候工作結束，然後再刪除它逾時。

trans-unit.source: In milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time after which the task executable is terminated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定終止工作可執行檔之後的時間量。

trans-unit.source: The time-out length, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 逾時長度，以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: Used to signal when a tool has been cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 用於工具已被取消時發出通知。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Projects may set this to override a task's ToolName.
trans-unit.target: 專案可能會設定此覆寫工作的 ToolName。

trans-unit.source: Tasks may override this to prevent that.
trans-unit.target: 工作可能會覆寫此選項可避免這種情形。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the executable file to run.
trans-unit.target: 取得要執行的可執行檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the executable file to run.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行的可執行檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the executable file to run.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要執行的可執行檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the file to run.
trans-unit.target: 要執行檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether the tool task will create a batch file for the command-line and execute that using the command-processor, rather than executing the command directly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定是否將建立批次檔的命令列工具工作，和執行使用命令處理器，而不是直接執行命令的參數。

trans-unit.source: If true, the tool task will create a batch file for the command-line and execute that using the command-processor.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 true，將會建立批次檔的命令列工具工作，並執行使用命令處理器。

trans-unit.source: If false the tool task will execute the command directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 false 工具工作就會直接執行命令。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether all task paratmeters are valid.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否所有工作參數皆有效。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all task parameters are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果所有的工作參數都有效。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the task will yield the node during tool execution.
trans-unit.target: 表示工作會在工具執行期間產生節點。

trans-unit.source: True when the task will yield the node during tool execution.
trans-unit.target: 當工具執行期間，工作將會產生節點，則為 true。
